name: Student Union
description: The central body representing the interests and events of the student community.

name: CS Club
description: A hub for computer science students to innovate, learn, and collaborate on various tech projects.

name: International Students Association
description: Celebrates and supports the diverse cultural background of our campus community.

name: Eco Club
description: Focused on promoting sustainability and environmental awareness on campus.

name: Career Services
description: Provides career guidance, job placement services, and networking opportunities.

name: Health and Wellness Center
description: Offers resources and support for physical and mental health on campus.

name: Athletics Department
description: Organizes sports events and maintains athletic facilities at the university.

name: Film Society
description: A community for film aficionados to watch, discuss, and appreciate cinema.

name: Business Club
description: Encourages entrepreneurship and business skills among students.

name: Arts Collective
description: A creative space for artists to showcase their work and engage with the arts.
